windows.title: Write data to Sheets - Google Chrome

content.title: Python code snippet
content.visibleText:
"""
# Set up the credentials
def authenticate_gspread(service_account_info):
    scopes = [
        'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsheets',
        'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive'
    ]
    credentials = Credentials.from_service_account_info(service_account_info, scopes=scopes)
    client = gspread.Client(auth=credentials)
    client.session = gspread.http_client.HTTPClient(authorize=credentials)
    return client

# Open the spreadsheet and write data
def write_data_to_sheet(service_account_info, sheet_url, data):
    client = authenticate_gspread(service_account_info)
    sheet = client.open_by_url(sheet_url)
    worksheet = sheet.get_worksheet(0)
    worksheet.update('A1', data)
"""

content.title: gsheets.py
content.visibleText:
import gspread
import gspread_http
from google.oauth2.service_account import Credentials

# Set up the credentials
def authenticate_gspread(json_credentials):
 scope = [
 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsheets',
 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive'
 ]
 sa_credentials = Credentials.from_service_account_info(json_credentials, scopes=scope)
 client = gspread.authorize(sa_credentials)
 return client
